channel.title: Crypt-X 24/7 VPS Webclient
channel.description:
[size=18pt][b]Crypt-X 24/7 Webclient![/b][/size]
[b]Features:[/b]
- GodWars - New Armour as: Steadfast boots, Torva etc - Dicing 100% ( 55x2) - Slayer store - Vps monitored 24/7 ( Get a SMS when the server is down Directly will fix this but server can run 2 weeks whitout lagg) - Level Points store (Editing it now!) - Great XP rates - Working on Modes Easy-medium-hard-very hard etc. - 99% Combat system ( No glitches) - x10 Hits - SMF forums - And many more features.
Website:
http://crypt-x.com
Play now:
http://crypt-x.com/webclient.html

item.title: Crypt-X 24/7 VPS Webclient
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Jeez, I don’t know how many times I must say the same thing, over and over again. This thread is very unappealing. If I were you, i’d revise this post and make it more attractive. By that I mean, posting pictures and listing unique features. Lets face it, the ones you have listed now lack originality. I can go to almost any advertisement thread and read the exact same stuff. With all of that being said, I wish you the best of luck. I just hope you take my suggestions into consideration.

Oh, and is it just me, or do we need an advertisement format?

Read full topic
